item.text: Meanwhile Saul, still breathing out threats to murder the Lord’s disciples, went to the high priest

and <st data-num="154" class="">requested</st> <st data-num="1992" class="">letters</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4314">to</st> the <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogues</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1154" class="">Damascus</st>, <st data-num="3704">so that</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> he <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">any</st> who <st data-num="1510" class="">belonged</st> to the <st data-num="3598" class="">Way</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5037" class="">either</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">women</st>, he could <st data-num="71" class="">bring</st> them as <st data-num="1210" class="">prisoners</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1722" class="">As</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4198">going along</st>, <st data-num="1448" class="">approaching</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1154" class="">Damascus</st>, <st data-num="1810" class="">suddenly</st> a <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="4015">flashed<n id="2" /> around</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">ground</st> and <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> a <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="4549" class="">Saul</st>, <st data-num="4549" class="">Saul</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">why</st> are you <st data-num="1377" class="">persecuting</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>?”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> he <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Who</st> <st data-num="1510">are</st> you, <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>?” He replied, “<st data-num="1473">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="1377" class="">persecuting</st>!

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="450">stand up</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> will be <st data-num="2980" class="">told</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st>.”

(<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> the <st data-num="435" class="">men</st><n id="1" /> who were <st data-num="4922">traveling with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stood</st> there <st data-num="1769" class="">speechless</st><n id="2" /> because they <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> the <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2334" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="3367">no one</st>.)<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> <st data-num="4569" class="">Saul</st> <st data-num="1453">got up</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">ground</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> although <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st> were <st data-num="455" class="">open</st>,<n id="1" /> he could <st data-num="991" class="">see</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5496" class="">Leading</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="5496">by the hand</st>, his companions<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1521" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="1154" class="">Damascus</st>.
For three days he could not see, and he neither ate nor drank anything.
Now there was a disciple in Damascus named Ananias. The Lord said to him in a vision, “Ananias,” and he replied, “Here I am, Lord.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> told <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="450">Get up</st> and <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="4505" class="">street</st> <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> ‘<st data-num="2117" class="">Straight</st>,’<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="2455" class="">Judas’</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> <st data-num="2212">look for</st> a man from <st data-num="5018" class="">Tarsus</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">named</st> <st data-num="4569" class="">Saul</st>. <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> he is <st data-num="4336" class="">praying</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he has <st data-num="1492" class="">seen</st> in a vision<n id="1" /> a <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">named</st> <st data-num="367" class="">Ananias</st> <st data-num="1525">come in</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2007" class="">place</st> his <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> on <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3704">so that</st> he may <st data-num="308">see again</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="367" class="">Ananias</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, I have <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="4183">many people</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="435" class="">man</st>, <st data-num="3745">how much</st> <st data-num="2556" class="">harm</st> he has <st data-num="4160" class="">done</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st> he <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="749">chief priests</st> to <st data-num="1210" class="">imprison</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="1941">call on</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>!”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="4198">Go</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="3778">this man</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="1589" class="">chosen</st> <st data-num="4632" class="">instrument</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="941" class="">carry</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st> <st data-num="5037" class="">and</st> <st data-num="935" class="">kings</st> <st data-num="5037" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="5263" class="">show</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3745" class="">how much</st> he <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="3958" class="">suffer</st> <st data-num="5228">for the sake</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>.”<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> <st data-num="367" class="">Ananias</st> <st data-num="565" class="">departed</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> the <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>, <st data-num="2007" class="">placed</st><n id="1" /> his <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="1909">on</st> <st data-num="846">Saul</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="80">Brother</st> <st data-num="4549" class="">Saul</st>, the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, who <st data-num="3708">appeared</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">road</st> as you <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> here,<n id="3" /> has <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3704">so that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> may <st data-num="308">see again</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> be <st data-num="4130" class="">filled</st> with the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>.”<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2112" class="">Immediately</st><n id="1" /> something <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="3013" class="">scales</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="634" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846">his</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he could <st data-num="308">see again</st>. He<n id="3" /> <st data-num="450">got up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> was <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st>,

and after taking some food, his strength returned.

For several days he was with the disciples in Damascus,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2112" class="">immediately</st> he began to <st data-num="2784" class="">proclaim</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogues</st>,<n id="1" /> saying, “<st data-num="3778">This man</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3956" class="">All</st><n id="1" /> who <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> him were <st data-num="1839" class="">amazed</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> were <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="1510">Is</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="3778" class="">man</st> who <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st> was <st data-num="4199" class="">ravaging</st><n id="3" /> those who <st data-num="1941">call on</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> who had <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st> <st data-num="2443">to</st> <st data-num="71" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> as <st data-num="1210" class="">prisoners</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="749">chief priests</st>?”
But Saul became more and more capable, and was causing consternation among the Jews who lived in Damascus by proving that Jesus is the Christ.
Now after some days had passed, the Jews plotted together to kill him,

<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4569" class="">Saul</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">learned</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="1917" class="">plot</st> against him.<n id="1" /> They were <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="3906" class="">watching</st><n id="2" /> the city <st data-num="4439" class="">gates</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> <st data-num="3704" class="">so that</st> they could <st data-num="337" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.
But his disciples took him at night and let him down through an opening in the wall by lowering him in a basket.
When he arrived in Jerusalem, he attempted to associate with the disciples, and they were all afraid of him because they did not believe that he was a disciple.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="921" class="">Barnabas</st> <st data-num="1949" class="">took</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">Saul</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="71" class="">brought</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1334" class="">related</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> he had <st data-num="1492" class="">seen</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3598" class="">road</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st><n id="4" /> the Lord had <st data-num="2980" class="">spoken</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1154" class="">Damascus</st> he had <st data-num="3955">spoken out boldly</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> staying <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="1531 1607">associating openly</st> with them<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>, <st data-num="3955">speaking out boldly</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.

He was <st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4802" class="">debating</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="1675">Greek-speaking Jews</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> they were <st data-num="2021" class="">trying</st> to <st data-num="337" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.
When the brothers found out about this, they brought him down to Caesarea and sent him away to Tarsus.

Then the church throughout Judea, Galilee, and Samaria experienced peace and thus was strengthened. Living in the fear of the Lord and in the encouragement of the Holy Spirit, the church increased in numbers.
Now as Peter was traveling around from place to place, he also came down to the saints who lived in Lydda.

He <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">named</st> <st data-num="132" class="">Aeneas</st> who had been <st data-num="2621" class="">confined</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> a <st data-num="2895" class="">mattress</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3638" class="">eight</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st> because<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739">he</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3886" class="">paralyzed</st>.

<st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="132">Aeneas</st>, <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2390" class="">heals</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>. <st data-num="450" class="">Get up</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4766" class="">make</st> <st data-num="4572">your own</st> <st data-num="4766">bed</st>!”<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="2112" class="">immediately</st> he <st data-num="450">got up</st>.
All those who lived in Lydda and Sharon saw him, and they turned to the Lord.
Now in Joppa there was a disciple named Tabitha (which in translation means Dorcas). She was continually doing good deeds and acts of charity.

<st data-num="1722" class="">At</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">time</st><n id="1" /> she <st data-num="1096" class="">became</st> <st data-num="770" class="">sick</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="599" class="">died</st>. When they had <st data-num="3068" class="">washed</st><n id="3" /> her body,<n id="4" /> they <st data-num="5087" class="">placed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> an <st data-num="5253" class="">upstairs room</st>.

Because <st data-num="3069" class="">Lydda</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1451" class="">near</st> <st data-num="2445" class="">Joppa</st>, when the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1722 846">there</st>, they <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> and <st data-num="3870" class="">urged</st> him, “<st data-num="1330">Come</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">without</st> <st data-num="3635" class="">delay</st>.”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="450" class="">got up</st> and <st data-num="4905" class="">went with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, and<n id="1" /> when <st data-num="3739">he</st> <st data-num="3854" class="">arrived</st><n id="2" /> they <st data-num="321" class="">brought</st> him <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="5253" class="">upper room</st>. <st data-num="3956" class="">All</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="5503" class="">widows</st> <st data-num="3936" class="">stood beside</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2799" class="">crying</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1925" class="">showing</st> him<n id="4" /> the <st data-num="5509" class="">tunics</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> other <st data-num="2440" class="">clothing</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="1393" class="">Dorcas</st> used to <st data-num="4160" class="">make</st><n id="7" /> while she <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="1544" class="">sent</st> them <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">outside</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1119">knelt</st> <st data-num="5087">down</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4336" class="">prayed</st>. <st data-num="1994" class="">Turning</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>, he <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="5000" class="">Tabitha</st>, <st data-num="339" class="">get up</st>.” <st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st> she <st data-num="455" class="">opened</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> when she <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st>, she <st data-num="339">sat up</st>.<n id="4" />

He <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> his <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st> and <st data-num="450" class="">helped</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="450">get up</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="5455" class="">called</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="40">saints</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5503" class="">widows</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3936" class="">presented</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="2198" class="">alive</st>.

This <st data-num="1096" class="">became</st> <st data-num="1110" class="">known</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">throughout</st> <st data-num="3650" class="">all</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2445" class="">Joppa</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.<n id="2" />
So Peter stayed many days in Joppa with a man named Simon, a tanner.
